snippet: A man was charged with murder on Friday in the hit-and-run death of a 15-year-old boy who was leaving the Somali Center of Kansas City, in what the F.B.I. is investigating as a possible hate crime, prosecutors said.
lead_paragraph: A man was charged with murder on Friday in the hit-and-run death of a 15-year-old boy who was leaving the Somali Center of Kansas City, in what the F.B.I. is investigating as a possible hate crime, prosecutors said.

headline.main: Missouri: Hate Crime Inquiry in Hit-and-Run Death
headline.print_headline: Missouri: Hate Crime Inquiry In Hit-And-Run Death
